filters.locationId: function(doc, req){ if ( doc.locationId != req.query.locationId ){ return false; } return true; }
filters.provider: function(doc, req){ if(doc.type != "Event"){ return true; } if ( doc.provider == req.query.provider ){ return true; } return false; }
filters.team: function(doc, req){ if(doc.type != "Event"){ return true; } if(req.query.team){ if(req.query.team.split(',').indexOf(doc.provider) >= 0){ return true; } } return false; }
